text: "I Will Not Bow" is a 2009 song by Breaking Benjamin. It was taken from their fourth studio album Dear Agony. It went to number 40 in the United States and number 98 in Canada. It did not chart anywhere else on the other countries charts. It was used in the 2009 movie Surrogates starring Bruce Willis. ==Track listing== : Category:2009 songs Category:Breaking Benjamin
title: I Will Not Bow
